attributes.action: Scrap the second homes allowance completely
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The second homes allowance is a waste of money!  If I worked in the city no company would pay for my second home rent or anything.  If you want the job as an MP either you move closer to parliament or you use the train.  Its the publics money!!!  ITs a joke!

rejection.details: MPs' expenses are a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
